title: Peter's Railway Christmas Steam
description: Peter saves Christmas! - In this charming and gentle tale, Peter and Grandpa save the day with a wonderful tale of night-time steam train adventures to Santa's woodland grotto, magically lit up by hundreds of tiny lamps. This "Little" Peter's Railway book is aimed at younger readers (3 - 6 years). There are lots of simple details on making things and running a miniature steam train. With 12 watercolour pictures by John Wardle.
author: Christopher G. C. Vine
